name: This War Of Mine (itch)
description:
In a a small city when a war occur. You play as a young wolf who was dragged into a war, with 9(?) other civilian in the group, your choice may either leave the outcome of group on who will survive, who will die. 

This game requires the opinion of you players too.  Please leave a comment on your thoughts. Every comment helps.

This year is also gonna be hard for me to continue this so I'll will have to slow down a bit. Sorry for the inconvenience
